means: 前所未闻的，无先例的，空前的

sentence.Network_en: He'd dyed his hair, which was almost unheard-of in the 1960s.
sentence.Network_cn: 他染了头发，这在20世纪60年代是罕见的事。

sentence.Network_en: We are developing our production at a speed unheard - of before.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正以前所未闻的速度发展生产.

sentence.Network_en: What he said is really an unheard - of fantastic story.
